actor_value1.name: Intelligence
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Intelligence is a measure of overall mental acuity, affects ability to hack terminals, condition and durability of crafted items, experience gained, and returns from scrapping.

actor_value1.name: Agility
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Agility is a measure of your overall finesse and reflexes. It affects the number of Action Points in V.A.T.S. and your ability to sneak.

actor_value1.name: Luck
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Luck is a measure of your general good fortune, and affects the recharge rate of Critical Hits as well as the condition and durability of items that you loot.

actor_value1.name: Strength
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Strength is a measure of your raw physical power. It affects how much you can carry, and the damage of all melee attacks.

actor_value1.name: Perception
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Perception affects your awareness of nearby enemies, your ability to detect stealthy movement, and your weapon accuracy in V.A.T.S. Additionally, having 5 PER allows you to target enemy limbs in V.A.T.S. and 10 PER informs you of enemy resistances while they are targeted in V.A.T.S.

actor_value1.name: Endurance
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Endurance is a measure of your overall physical fitness. It affects your total Health, the Action Point drain from sprinting, and your resistance to disease.

actor_value1.name: Charisma
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Charisma is your ability to lead and help others. It allows you to share higher point Perks and also affects your rewards from Group Quests and prices when you barter.

actor_value1.name: Luck
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Luck is a measure of your general good fortune, and affects the recharge rate of Critical Hits as well as the condition and durability of items that you loot.

actor_value1.name: Agility
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Agility is a measure of your overall finesse and reflexes. It affects the number of Action Points in V.A.T.S. and your ability to sneak.

actor_value1.desc: Intelligence is a measure of overall mental acuity, affects ability to hack terminals, condition and durability of crafted items, experience gained, and returns from scrapping.

actor_value1.name: Charisma
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Charisma is your ability to lead and help others. It allows you to share higher point Perks and also affects your rewards from Group Quests and prices when you barter.

actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Perception affects your awareness of nearby enemies, your ability to detect stealthy movement, and your weapon accuracy in V.A.T.S. actor_value1.name: Strength
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Strength is a measure of your raw physical power. It affects how much you can carry, and the damage of all melee attacks.

actor_value1.name: Perception
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Perception affects your awareness of nearby enemies, your ability to detect stealthy movement, and your weapon accuracy in V.A.T.S. Additionally, having 5 PER allows you to target enemy limbs in V.A.T.S. and 10 PER informs you of enemy resistances while they are targeted in V.A.T.S.

actor_value1.name: Endurance
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Endurance is a measure of your overall physical fitness. It affects your total Health, the Action Point drain from sprinting, and your resistance to disease.

actor_value1.name: Charisma
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Charisma is your ability to lead and help others. It allows you to share higher point Perks and also affects your rewards from Group Quests and prices when you barter.

actor_value1.name: Intelligence
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Intelligence is a measure of overall mental acuity, affects ability to hack terminals, condition and durability of crafted items, experience gained, and returns from scrapping.

actor_value1.name: Agility
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Agility is a measure of your overall finesse and reflexes. It affects the number of Action Points in V.A.T.S. and your ability to sneak.

actor_value1.name: Luck
actor_value1.label: AVIF
actor_value1.desc: Luck is a measure of your general good fortune, and affects the recharge rate of Critical Hits as well as the condition and durability of items that you loot.
